description: French Bistro & Industrial Tables are an ideal choice for busy cafes & commercial venues, as they are robust, easy to move around and elegantly designed.  We supply a wide range of Café Furniture, Industrial Tables and French Bistro items in a variety of styles which will provide a real sense of style to commercial interiors & industrial design interiors.
name: French Bistro & Industrial Tables
